dt: {bc}giving no sign of feeling or emotion {bc}{sx|expressionless||}

pt: {sc}impassive{/sc} {sc}stoic{/sc} {sc}phlegmatic{/sc} {sc}apathetic{/sc} {sc}stolid{/sc} mean unresponsive to something that might normally excite interest or emotion. {sc}impassive{/sc} stresses the absence of any external sign of emotion in action or facial expression.

pt.t: met the news with an {it}impassive{/it} look

pt: {sc}stoic{/sc} implies an apparent indifference to pleasure or especially to pain often as a matter of principle or self-discipline.
{sc}phlegmatic{/sc} implies a temperament or constitution hard to arouse.
{sc}apathetic{/sc} may imply a puzzling or deplorable indifference or inertness.
{sc}stolid{/sc} implies a habitual absence of interest, responsiveness, or curiosity.

shortdef: giving no sign of feeling or emotion : expressionless
unsusceptible to or destitute of emotion : apathetic
